about.summary: An extension for colcon-core to set an environment variable to find pkg-config files.

name: colcon-pkg-config
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "colcon-pkg-config" %}
{% set version = "0.1.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://github.com/colcon/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c1d864aef5aa6209cb574eaac8fc7b6374f59a50f5c08d23d00684463926f33b

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.5
  run:
    - python >=3.5
    - colcon-core

test:
  imports:
    - {{ name.replace("-", "_") }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/colcon/{{ name }}
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: |
    An extension for colcon-core to set an environment variable to find pkg-config files.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - seanyen
    - wolfv
